about_the_game:
Porn stars DLC for Clip Maker contain pornstar female characters, dressed in different wardrobe (undressable). You can make excellent art images, manga, visual novels, stories, comics, videos, films and clips. Or just have a fun with:

Blake
Bonnie
Caprice
Connie
Dani
Eva
Jia
Samantha
Sunny
Sybil
Evelyn

All characters have outstanding body parts and are dressed very sexy, accordingly to their role, has the intimate body details, female and transgender genitals.

All content of this DLC will be available directly from the game, in the menu where you are making settings of the timeline.

Please note that content of this DLC will be updating. After buying the DLC you will get all updates for free.

Please post images or links to your 18+ art in the Discord, because of post public nudity art is not allowed in the discussions on Steam

content_descriptors.notes: In this DLC users can take off all clothes from the characters, make them completely naked.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later (64-BIT Required!!!) It is not working on 32-BIT systems!
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
